net.sf.jclec.problem.util.dataset.instance

Interface IInstance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Instance

    public interface IInstance
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface definition for an instance. Defines the main methods to read/store values for the instances.
    Author:
    Amelia Zafra, Sebastian Ventura, Alberto Cano

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IInstance copy()
      Copy method
      double getValue(int attributeIndex)
      Returns vector's attribute value in internal format.
      double[] getValues()
      Get value array of the this instance.
      double getWeight()
      Returns the weight of this instance.
      void setValues(double[] values)
      Set value array of the this instance.
      void setWeight(double weight)
      Sets the weight of this instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getWeight

        double getWeight()
        Returns the weight of this instance.
        Returns:
        instance weight

      • setWeight

        void setWeight(double weight)
        Sets the weight of this instance.
        Parameters:
        weight - instance weight

      • getValues

        double[] getValues()
        Get value array of the this instance.
        Returns:
        value array of the vector

      • setValues

        void setValues(double[] values)
        Set value array of the this instance.
        Parameters:
        values - array of the vector

      • getValue

        double getValue(int attributeIndex)
        Returns vector's attribute value in internal format.
        Parameters:
        attributeIndex - attribute index for value to read.
        Returns:
        the specified value as a double (If the corresponding attribute is categorical then it returns the value's index as a double).

      • copy

        IInstance copy()
        Copy method
        Returns:
        A copy of this instance
